tab1.text1:
I hope you put on your big boy pants, because you're about to TriHard.

We currently have three servers running:
25x PVP
10x PVP
5x PVE

In this menu you'll find some useful information to help you.

Please use the Discord icon in the bottom-left of the menu to join our Discord server.

tab2.text1:
The rates on our servers are:
25x PVP
10x PVP
5x PVE

10-man Tribe Size


You can find more information about the rates on our Discord server.
tab2.text2:
All drops except white drops contain Weapons and Tools


White: Boss drops

Green: Consumables and Kibble
Cloth and Hide Armor
Beginner Saddles

Blue: Resources
Chitin and Ghillie Armor
Beginner/Mid-Game Saddles

Purple: Scuba
Saddles
Resourcse
Mid-game Saddles

Yellow: Flak and Riot Armor
Resources
Late-Game Saddles

Red: Flak and Riot Armor
Late-Game & Tek Saddles


You can find more information about the drops on our Discord server.

tab3.text1:
1. No Meshing
You will be permanantly banned for meshing across all servers

2.No Insiding
That's bad, and you get a ban. Don't be that guy.

3. Do Not Exploit Game Mechanics
This goes for the game itself and the mods. This includes things like duping, turning S+ forcefields and and off repeatedly, floating structures, Behemoth Hatchframes for raiding. No Invisible structures etc. (This list will expand as more exploits are found.
You will be banned if you are reported but will have the ability to appeal the ban.

4. Cage Timers
You may cage somebody during the duration of a raid.
If you cage somebody randomly (eg. griefing) they must be released within 30 minutes.

5. Do Not Disrespect Admins.
They are trying to help you!

6. Skiffs and Dions must be able to be hit by turrets.
Do not box them in to make them invincible to bullets.
No Dick Paracers/Dick Rafts

7.Do not kill participants, dinos or maliciously disrupt events. You will be suspended from the server for 12 hours.

8. NO AUTOBREEDING
If you are found to have a out-of-control autobreed on, you will be dino wiped.

9. You are allowed TWO bases per map
Rafts & Motorboats don't count as a base.
You have 12 hours to pick up your FOB from a raid unless you plan on using the location for a base slot.

10. No Racism or Illegal talk in chat.
